about: Eight years architecting AI-driven solutions where simplicity meets innovation. Leading Slalom's AI Value Platform—transforming how organizations measure, prioritize, and deploy generative AI.
tagline:
Eight years architecting AI-driven solutions where simplicity meets innovation.
Leading Slalom's AI Value Platform—transforming how organizations measure, prioritize, and deploy generative AI.

AWS Solution Architect.title: AWS Solution Architect
AWS Solution Architect.summary: Designing and deploying scalable, secure cloud infrastructure across diverse use cases
examples: Built performant RAG architecture for utilities using Textract, ECS, Bedrock, OpenSearch, and RDS Postgres with pgvector for regulatory document analysis
Architected AI Value Platform serverless infrastructure with DynamoDB, Lambda, API Gateway, and S3 for hundreds of internal users and external clients
Developed PSPS mobile application infrastructure using CDK and CloudFormation for wildfire prevention outage warnings
Created monitoring systems with CloudWatch and Grafana dashboards at Triblio to increase deployment stability and observability

GenAI & RAG Architecture.title: GenAI & RAG Architecture
GenAI & RAG Architecture.summary: Expert in retrieval-augmented generation systems, embeddings, and multimodal LLM applications
examples: Built multimodal RAG application for utilities using OCR, document chunking strategies, and vector search with pgvector and OpenSearch
Architected EnhanceIQ's event-driven task analysis service processing hundreds to thousands of tasks through Step Function pipelines running 12 different analytical prompts per task
Developed AI Capability Assessment and internal use case library to establish thought leadership in GenAI investment strategy
Leveraged multiple embedding models and vector databases to optimize semantic search and retrieval accuracy across different document types

Cloud-Native Systems.title: Cloud-Native Systems
Cloud-Native Systems.summary: Building scalable, resilient serverless and containerized applications
examples: Led development of AI Value Platform using serverless architecture with Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB serving hundreds of users
Configured Kubernetes and Docker Swarm orchestration with zero-downtime deployment strategies at Accenture Federal Services
Developed full-stack applications with automated S3 static site deployments and security-first architecture patterns
Managed Ansible Tower workflows for 200+ automated operations at federal scale

Python / Node.js / TypeScript.title: Python / Node.js / TypeScript
Python / Node.js / TypeScript.summary: Full-stack development with modern languages across frontend, backend, and infrastructure
examples: Built React frontend and TypeScript Node.js backend for AI Value Platform with test-driven development practices
Developed Python-based RAG applications with AWS services for utilities regulatory drafting assistance
Created Node.js/TypeScript mobile application for PSPS wildfire prevention system with Angular frontend
Contributed as full-stack engineer at Triblio building end-to-end features integrating with third-party services

Angular / React / Ionic.title: Angular / React / Ionic
Angular / React / Ionic.summary: Modern frontend development for web and mobile applications
examples: Built React frontend for AI Value Platform with complex state management and real-time data visualization
Developed Angular/Python full-stack solution for GenAI applications with reusable framework patterns
Created mobile application using Node.js/TypeScript and Angular for Public Safety Power Shutoff system
Built responsive interfaces handling hundreds of users with smooth interactions and accessibility standards

Docker / Kubernetes.title: Docker / Kubernetes
Docker / Kubernetes.summary: Container orchestration and deployment automation at scale
examples: Configured Kubernetes orchestration with zero-downtime deployment strategies for federal client at Accenture
Managed Docker Swarm environments supporting 200+ automated operations via Ansible Tower
Built containerized deployment pipelines for GenAI applications with security-first configurations
Developed CLI deployment automation from scratch at Triblio to increase deployment velocity and stability

CI/CD & IaC (Terraform/CDK).title: CI/CD & IaC (Terraform/CDK)
CI/CD & IaC (Terraform/CDK).summary: Infrastructure as code and automated deployment pipelines
examples: Developed custom IaC with CDK and CloudFormation for PSPS mobile application infrastructure
Built Terraform modules for Apollo GraphQL federated architecture for national pet retailer's API infrastructure
Created custom CI/CD deployment automation with GitLab for multi-environment workflows
Designed DevOps pipelines and infrastructure for deploying code at scale for large federal client
Built CLI deployment automation from scratch at Triblio with comprehensive monitoring and rollback capabilities

API Design (REST/GraphQL).title: API Design (REST/GraphQL)
API Design (REST/GraphQL).summary: Scalable API architecture for complex data requirements
examples: Architected API Gateway-backed REST APIs for AI Value Platform handling complex ROI calculations and user management
Built Terraform modules for Apollo GraphQL federated architecture enabling microservices communication
Designed RESTful APIs for GenAI applications with security best practices and rate limiting
Developed full-stack features with backend APIs integrating third-party services at Triblio

SQL / NoSQL Databases.title: SQL / NoSQL Databases
SQL / NoSQL Databases.summary: Database design, scaling, and optimization for diverse data patterns
examples: Designed DynamoDB schemas for AI Value Platform supporting complex querying patterns and high-volume data access
Implemented RDS Postgres with pgvector for semantic search and vector embeddings in RAG architecture
Optimized NoSQL database scaling strategies for serverless microservices handling variable loads
Developed schema designs balancing normalization, performance, and cost across SQL and NoSQL databases

Event-Driven Architecture.title: Event-Driven Architecture
Event-Driven Architecture.summary: Asynchronous systems using message queues and event orchestration
examples: Architected EnhanceIQ as event-driven service using SQS, Lambda, and Step Functions to orchestrate complex LLM inference workflows
Built systems processing hundreds to thousands of tasks asynchronously through GenAI Step Function pipelines
Designed event-driven pipelines for file drop processing at utilities, managing ingestion and transformation workflows
Created PSPS notification system responding to real-time events for wildfire prevention outage warnings

Security & IAM Best Practices.title: Security & IAM Best Practices
Security & IAM Best Practices.summary: Enterprise security standards with least privilege IAM policies
examples: Implemented IAM best practices and test-driven security for AI Value Platform maintaining enterprise security standards
Built security-first architecture with IAM policies for compliance-sensitive utilities regulatory environment
Developed least privilege access patterns for serverless applications using AWS IAM roles and policies
Established reusable security framework for client GenAI applications with audit logging and access controls

Bash / Linux.title: Bash / Linux
examples: Built CLI deployment automation from scratch using Bash scripting at Triblio
Developed custom automation scripts for CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure management
Managed Linux-based deployment environments and troubleshooting at federal scale
Created monitoring and observability scripts for CloudWatch and Grafana integration

Agile / Test-Driven Development.title: Agile / Test-Driven Development
Agile / Test-Driven Development.summary: Iterative development with comprehensive testing strategies
examples: Championed test-driven development for AI Value Platform achieving high team velocity while maintaining quality
Implemented TDD practices across React frontend and TypeScript Node.js backend with comprehensive test coverage
Led agile ceremonies and sprint planning for team of 6 engineers with continuous delivery practices
Built reusable testing frameworks ensuring reliability across GenAI application deployments

System Architecture.title: System Architecture
System Architecture.summary: Microservices, serverless, and scalable system design
examples: Architected AI Value Platform as full-stack serverless microservices with React, TypeScript, Lambda, and DynamoDB
Designed scalable RAG architecture handling multimodal document processing for compliance-sensitive environments
Built event-driven microservices architecture for EnhanceIQ processing complex LLM workflows asynchronously
Developed Apollo GraphQL federated architecture enabling independent microservices deployment and scaling
Served on technical architecture team designing DevOps pipelines and infrastructure for large-scale federal systems

Technical Direction & Team Leadership.title: Technical Direction & Team Leadership
Technical Direction & Team Leadership.summary: Leading engineering teams with clear vision and technical excellence
examples: Lead development team of 6 engineers building AI Value Platform serving hundreds of users
Set technical direction for serverless architecture, test-driven development, and AI-assisted coding adoption
Served as primary architect and engineer building full-stack features with React and TypeScript Node.js
Guided team through complex technical decisions balancing velocity, security, and maintainability
Championed modern development practices resulting in high team velocity while maintaining enterprise standards

Engineering Mentorship & Career Developm.title: Engineering Mentorship & Career Development
Engineering Mentorship & Career Developm.summary: Building trust and pulling developers forward in AI-assisted engineering
examples: Developed strong trust and relationships with team members, joining with them in adopting AI-assisted development
Championed AI-assisted coding adoption across the team, demonstrating practical applications and best practices
Held regular knowledge transfer sessions and syncs to share learnings and architectural patterns
Maintained open availability to guide developers through technical challenges and listen to their concerns
Created safe environment for experimentation and learning in the rapidly evolving AI engineering landscape

Strategic Planning & ROI Analysis.title: Strategic Planning & ROI Analysis
Strategic Planning & ROI Analysis.summary: Data-driven technical decisions aligned with business value
examples: Built proprietary AI Value Calculator with complex ROI forecasting models analyzing implementation time, adoption rates, and KPI impact
Developed methodology for GenAI/ML use case prioritization incorporating forecasted ROI, risk, effort, and value
Created AI Capability Assessment to evaluate organizational readiness for AI use case execution
Provided directional TCO estimates and value quantification enabling data-driven AI investment decisions
Established thought leadership in GenAI investment strategy through internal use case library and delivery pattern tracking

Solution Architecture.title: Solution Architecture
Solution Architecture.summary: End-to-end technical solutions aligned with business requirements
examples: Architected AI Value Platform as company's first external client-facing product with enterprise security standards
Designed performant RAG architecture for utilities combining multimodal OCR, vector search, and compliance controls
Built EnhanceIQ event-driven architecture processing complex LLM workflows with high throughput and reliability
Developed reusable framework patterns for client GenAI applications with security-first design principles
Created Apollo GraphQL federated architecture enabling independent team development and deployment

Client Partnership.title: Client Partnership
Client Partnership.summary: Joint problem-solving and honest technical guidance for stakeholders
examples: Managed multiple stakeholders for AI Value Platform, shaping platform direction through collaborative ideation
Provided honest assessments of technical feasibility while exploring creative solutions with clients
Took input from clients for new features and translated requirements into actionable technical designs
Built utilities RAG application through close partnership in compliance-sensitive regulatory environment
Enabled AI Value Platform's first external client access through careful requirements gathering and trust-building

Innovation & Vision.title: Innovation & Vision
Innovation & Vision.summary: Forward-thinking leadership and knowledge sharing across the organization
examples: Championed AI-assisted coding adoption across Slalom, demonstrating practical value and building internal momentum
Built AI Capability Assessment and use case library to establish thought leadership in GenAI investment strategy
Encouraged knowledge sharing across company, being visionary while giving back as much as receiving
Developed innovative AI Value Calculator methodology for GenAI/ML use case prioritization
Led development of company's first external client-facing AI product, pushing boundaries of internal capabilities

positions.title: Technical Lead - AI Value Platform
achievements: Lead development team of 6 engineers building Slalom's AI Value Platform serving hundreds of internal users and company's first external client access, enabling organizations to make data-driven decisions around AI investments with methodical approach prioritizing forecasted ROI while incorporating risk, effort, and value

Built proprietary AI Value Calculator with complex ROI forecasting models analyzing implementation time, time to benefit yield, adoption rates, and KPI impact—providing directional TCO estimates and value quantification for GenAI/ML use case prioritization

Developed AI Capability Assessment to evaluate organizational readiness for AI use case execution, and built internal use case library to track Slalom's GenAI delivery patterns—establishing thought leadership in GenAI investment strategy

Architected and built EnhanceIQ, an event-driven task analysis service evaluating GenAI opportunities from process and role perspectives—processing hundreds to thousands of tasks through GenAI Step Function pipelines running 12 different analytical prompts per task, using SQS, Lambda, and Step Functions to orchestrate complex LLM inference workflows

Served as primary architect and engineer building full-stack features with React frontend, TypeScript Node.js backend, serverless architecture with DynamoDB and Lambda behind API Gateway—implemented IAM best practices and test-driven development while championing AI-assisted coding adoption, achieving high team velocity while maintaining enterprise security standards

positions.title: Senior Consultant - Solution Architect
achievements: Built GenAI application for utilities to assist regulatory drafting using performant RAG architecture with AWS services (Textract, ECS, Bedrock, OpenSearch, RDS Postgres with pgvector) and multimodal LLM OCR, implementing security best practices and IAM policies for compliance-sensitive environment
Developed full-stack Angular/Python solution with automated S3 static site deployments—established reusable framework for client GenAI applications with security-first architecture

positions.title: Cloud Architect / Full Stack Engineer
achievements: Developed mobile application for Public Safety Power Shutoff system to warn customers of planned outages for wildfire prevention using Node.js/TypeScript and Angular, including custom IaC with CDK and CloudFormation
Built Terraform modules for Apollo GraphQL federated architecture for national pet retailer's API infrastructure and developed custom CI/CD deployment automation with GitLab

positions.title: Software/DevOps Engineer
achievements: Built CLI deployment automation from scratch and developed monitoring systems with AWS CloudWatch and Grafana dashboards to increase deployment velocity, stability, and infrastructure observability
Contributed as full stack engineer building end-to-end features integrating with third-party services to manage account-based marketing workflows

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
achievements: Designed DevOps pipelines and infrastructure for deploying code at scale for a large-scale federal client as part of the technical architecture team
Configured Kubernetes and Docker Swarm orchestration with zero-downtime deployment strategies, managing Ansible Tower workflows for 200+ automated operations
